Cherrycake\Items::filter

Filters the items using the passed function.

    Signature

    public function filter(callable $function )

    Parameters

    $function — object
    An anonymous function that will be called for each element on the list, and will receive two parameters: the index of the element and the element itself. This function must return true if the element is to be kept on the list, and false if it's to be removed.
